results.title: Report a missed bin collection - West Sussex County Council
results.snippet: Your local district or borough council is responsible for emptying your household bins. Use the location search below to report a missed collection.

results.snippet: ... bins, including general waste, recycling, garden waste and bulky waste collections ... Report a missed bin collection. How to report a missed collection.

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The provided content informs the user that 'The request is blocked.' This information suggests no help or suggestions for reporting a missed bin collection, which is not helpful as a Council Resident who needs to address this issue.
Reason.next_actions: I would need to find alternative resources or channels to report a missed bin collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: The provided content does not serve the needs of a Council Resident who wants to report a missed bin collection. A key gap lies in the absence of information on what actions to take, who to contact, and estimated time for resolution, making it unsatisfactory.
